channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Democratic Pennsylvania election official apologizes for controversial comments as Senate recount begins

item.title: Will Trump Choose Victory or Defeat in Ukraine?
item.description: Victory is achievable. Defeat would be catastrophic. The choice is now Trump’s.

item.title: Why Pete Hegseth Is The Right Man To Run The Pentagon
item.description: Hegseth is not only qualified but also uniquely positioned to lead in a time when bold, reform-minded leadership is desperately needed.

item.title: Pete Hegseth Is Right for the DOD
item.description: If the U.S. military wants to maintain its standing with the American people, its leadership needs to display some moral courage.

item.title: Senate showdown: GOP secures deal with Schumer to save coveted appellate judges for Trump
item.description: Senate Democrats and Republicans struck a midnight deal Wednesday that would secure four crucial appellate court judge nominations for President-elect...

item.title: Gift Guide To Seasonal Family Books From Small And Indie Publishers
item.description: Small publishers are bringing out new classics and reviving old ones. Check out these Advent and Christmas family books.

item.title: Let Me Be Frank: Stop Bilking Taxpayers in Order to Bilk Taxpayers
item.description: Governments’ habit of spending your money to convince you to give them more money is getting ridiculous.

item.title: Migrant caravan forms in Mexico; goal is to reach U.S. before Trump's inauguration
item.description: About 1,500 migrants formed a new caravan Wednesday in southern Mexico, hoping to walk or catch rides to the U.S. border.

item.title: Trump-backed Nick Begich beats Democratic Rep. Mary Peltola for Alaska's only House seat
item.description: Republican Nick Begich has won Alaska's U.S. House race, defeating Democratic Rep. Mary Peltola to claim the seat once held by his grandfather.

item.title: How Trump Can Make The Nixonian Dream Of 1,000 Nuclear Power Plants A Reality
item.description: As we grapple with the twin challenges of energy security and energy reliability, revisiting Nixon’s vision offers valuable lessons.

item.title: The GOP’s New Coalition Requires a New Economic Agenda
item.description: Help the needy, not the greedy, as a wise man once argued.

item.title: Transgender women are 'every bit as 'biologically female' as cis women,' bisexual, trans state lawmaker claims
item.description: Montana state Rep. Zooey Zephyr claims transgender women are just as much "'biologically female' as cis women."

item.title: How Trump Can Release Biden’s Regulatory Brake
item.description: Here are some actions the president can take in his first week in office to kickstart deregulatory efforts.

item.title: FBI director, Homeland Security secretary refuse to publicly testify, Senate chairman says
item.description: FBI Director Christopher Wray and DHS Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas after facing backlash for skipping public national security hearings this week.

item.title: Now Is Not The Time For Senate Republicans To Play Nice On Biden’s Judicial Nominees
item.description: In the months before Trump assumes office, Democrats control the Senate, and President Biden has sent up a slew of hardcore leftist nominees.
